title: Duality Symmetry in the Schwarz-Sen Model
abstract: The duality symmetric but not manifestly covariant action proposed by Schwarz-Sen is canonically quantized in the Coulomb gauge. The resulting theory turns out to be, nevertheless, relativistically invariant. It is shown, afterwards, that the Schwarz-Sen model naturally emerges when duality is implemented as a local symmetry of sourceless electrodynamics. This implies in the equivalence of these theories at the quantum level.
